scripts.deploy:staging: npm run build:web && npm run build:functions && FIREBASE_PROJECT=reflat-staging node tools/scripts/deploy/deployAll.js
scripts.deploy:staging:hosting: npm run build:web && FIREBASE_PROJECT=reflat-staging node tools/scripts/deploy/deployHosting.js
scripts.deploy:staging:functions: npm run build:functions && firebase deploy --only functions -P reflat-staging
scripts.deploy:staging:functions:build: npm run build:functions && npm run deploy:staging:functions
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build:web && npm run build:functions && FIREBASE_PROJECT=reflat node tools/scripts/deploy/deployAll.js
scripts.deploy:prod:functions: npm run build:functions && FIREBASE_PROJECT=reflat node tools/scripts/deploy/deployFunctions.js
scripts.deploy:staging:function: functionName => npm run build:functions && firebase deploy --only functions:$functionName -P reflat-staging
scripts.deploy:prod:function: functionName => npm run build:functions && firebase deploy --only functions:$functionName -P reflat
